channel.title: Client compiler error :(
channel.description: I have being posted this topics but no reponse so can anyone help me? I am under window seven and in my compiler I got this error: [img]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/1886/nouvelleimagebitmapik.png[/img] (The specified path was not found. Directory name invalid. press any key to continue.)

item.title: Client compiler error :(
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Just use thisâ€¦

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Client compiler error :(
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

Depending on the jdk version you have, you have to change the jdk number in the compiler to your version, The newest version is 21 so far

Read full topic

item.title: Client compiler error :(
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

You right click the compiler and edit it and type your jdk or java version ( the latest one you have downloaded not the lastest one out) and it should work

Read full topic
